t: In*p that day you will say: “I*pn will praise you, Lord.*s Although*ld you were angry with me, your*ln anger has turned away and*ld you have comforted me.
Surely*ln God is my salvation; I*ld will trust and not be afraid. The*ln Lord,*s the Lord*s himself, is my strength and my defense; he*ld has become my salvation.”
With*ln joy you will draw water from*ld the wells of salvation.
In*p that day you will say: “Give*pn praise to the Lord,*s proclaim his name; make*ld known among the nations what he has done, and*ld proclaim that his name is exalted.
Sing*ln to the Lord,*s for he has done glorious things; let*ld this be known to all the world.
Shout*ln aloud and sing for joy, people of Zion, for*ld great is the Holy One of Israel among you.”
